entity-table.description: Data table with columns and sorting

columns.description: Columns can be Column objects or simple string field names - accepts readonly for generated const arrays

data.description: Data array - primary prop for data. Accepts readonly or mutable arrays, and unknown for generated components

entity.description: Entity name for auto-fetch OR data array (backwards compatible)

itemActions.description: Item actions from generated code - maps to rowActions

defaultPageSize.description: Items per page for automatic pagination (default: 20)

query.description: Query singleton binding for filter/sort state. When provided, syncs with the query singleton for filtering and sorting. Example: "@TaskQuery"

entity.description: Entity name for auto-fetch OR data array (backwards compatible)

data.description: Data array - primary prop for data

fieldNames.description: Field names - accepts readonly for generated const arrays

query.description: Query singleton binding for filter/sort state. When provided, syncs with the query singleton for filtering and sorting. Example: "@TaskQuery"

entity-cards.description: Grid of cards for visual content

alignItems.description: Align cards vertically in their cells

fieldNames.description: Field names to display - accepts readonly for generated const arrays

columns.description: Alias for fieldNames - used by generated code

data.description: Data array for data-bound usage - accepts readonly for generated const arrays

onCardClick.description: Callback when a card is clicked

query.description: Query singleton binding for filter/sort state. When provided, syncs with the query singleton for filtering and sorting. Example: "@TaskQuery"

entity-detail.description: Single entity view with all fields

actions.description: Unified actions array - first action with variant='primary' is the main action

fieldNames.description: Field names - accepts readonly for generated const arrays

fields.description: Explicit field definitions - accepts readonly for generated const arrays

actions.description: Unified actions array - first action with variant='primary' is the main action

fieldNames.description: Field names - accepts readonly for generated const arrays

fields.description: Explicit field definitions - accepts readonly for generated const arrays

page-header.description: Page title with optional breadcrumb and action buttons

backEvent.description: Event to emit when back is clicked (default: BACK)

actions.description: Actions array - first action with variant='primary' (or first action) is the main action

form.description: Complete form with fields and actions

onSubmit.description: Submit handler - receives form data, or event name string for trait dispatch

onCancel.description: Cancel handler - function or event name string for trait dispatch

mode.description: Form mode - 'create' for new records, 'edit' for updating existing

fields.description: Fields definition (schema format) - accepts readonly for generated const arrays

cancelLabel.description: Cancel button label (if provided, shows cancel button)

showCancel.description: Show cancel button (defaults to true for schema forms)

title.description: Form title (used by ModalSlot to extract title)

submitEvent.description: Event to dispatch on successful submit (defaults to 'SAVE')

cancelEvent.description: Event to dispatch on cancel (defaults to 'CANCEL')

relationsData.description: Data for relation fields: { fieldName: RelationOption[] }

relationsLoading.description: Loading state for relation data: { fieldName: boolean }

onSubmit.description: Submit handler - receives form data, or event name string for trait dispatch

onCancel.description: Cancel handler - function or event name string for trait dispatch

mode.description: Form mode - 'create' for new records, 'edit' for updating existing

fields.description: Fields definition (schema format) - accepts readonly for generated const arrays

cancelLabel.description: Cancel button label (if provided, shows cancel button)

showCancel.description: Show cancel button (defaults to true for schema forms)

title.description: Form title (used by ModalSlot to extract title)

submitEvent.description: Event to dispatch on successful submit (defaults to 'SAVE')

cancelEvent.description: Event to dispatch on cancel (defaults to 'CANCEL')

relationsData.description: Data for relation fields: { fieldName: RelationOption[] }

relationsLoading.description: Loading state for relation data: { fieldName: boolean }

conditionalFields.description: Map of fieldId â†’ S-expression condition for conditional field display. Example: { 'priceField': ['=', '@entity.formValues.showPrices', true] }

hiddenCalculations.description: Hidden calculations that emit GLOBAL_VARIABLE_SET on field change. Array of { variableName, expression, triggerFields }

violationTriggers.description: Violation conditions that emit VIOLATION_DETECTED when met. Array of { condition, violation: { law, article, actionType, message } }

evaluationContext.description: Context for S-expression evaluation containing formValues, globalVariables, and localVariables

sections.description: Nested form sections with optional conditions. Array of { id, title, condition?, fields, collapsible? }

onFieldChange.description: Callback when any field value changes, receives { fieldId, value, formValues }

event.description: Event name to dispatch on search (schema metadata, wired by trait) This is metadata used by the trait generator, not by the component.

entity.description: Entity type for context-aware search. When provided, search events include entity context.

query.description: Query singleton binding for state management. When provided, syncs search state with the query singleton. Example: "@TaskQuery"

event.description: Event name to dispatch on search (schema metadata, wired by trait) This is metadata used by the trait generator, not by the component.

entity.description: Entity type for context-aware search. When provided, search events include entity context.

query.description: Query singleton binding for state management. When provided, syncs search state with the query singleton. Example: "@TaskQuery"

onFilterChange.description: Callback when a filter changes - for EntityStore integration

query.description: Query singleton binding for state management. When provided, syncs filter state with the query singleton. Example: "@TaskQuery"

tabs.description: Tab items (alias for items - used by generated code)

maxItems.description: Maximum items to show (truncates with ellipsis)

onStepClick.description: Callback when a completed step is clicked

allowNavigation.description: Allow clicking on completed steps to navigate back

isValid.description: Whether the current step is valid (enables Next/Complete)

showComplete.description: Show the Complete button (on last step)

onBack.description: Event to emit on Back click

onNext.description: Event to emit on Next click

onComplete.description: Event to emit on Complete click

onBackClick.description: Direct callback for Back (alternative to event)

onNextClick.description: Direct callback for Next (alternative to event)

onCompleteClick.description: Direct callback for Complete (alternative to event)

maxVisiblePages.description: Maximum number of page buttons to show

icon.description: Icon to display. Accepts either: - A Lucide icon component (LucideIcon) - A string icon name (e.g., "check-circle", "x-circle")

title.description: Primary text to display - use title or message (message is alias for backwards compat)

message.description: Alias for title - used by schema patterns

duration.description: Auto-dismiss duration in milliseconds (0 = no auto-dismiss)

currentValue.description: Current value as number for trend calculation

invertTrend.description: Whether up is good (green) or bad (red)

metrics.description: Metrics to display (schema format) - accepts readonly for compatibility with generated const arrays

data.description: Data to calculate stats from - accepts readonly for compatibility with generated const arrays

dashboard-grid.description: Multi-column grid for widgets and stats cards

title.description: Override modal title (extracted from children if not provided)
Override drawer title (extracted from children if not provided)

onClose.description: Callback when dialog is closed (cancel or close button)

ratio.description: Initial ratio (0-100, percentage of first pane)

minSize.description: Minimum size of either pane in pixels

master-detail.description: List on left, selected item detail on right

emptyDetail.description: Content shown when nothing is selected

hasSelection.description: Whether an item is currently selected

tabbed-layout.description: Tabbed content areas with shared header/context

vstack.description: Vertical flex container for stacking children

hstack.description: Horizontal flex container for inline children

box.description: Generic styled container with padding, borders, and backgrounds

grid.description: CSS Grid layout for multi-column content

spacer.description: Flexible space that expands to fill available room

renderEntities.description: Entity type names to render (optional filter)

renderer.description: Renderer type hint from schema (e.g., 'phaser', 'canvas'). Currently ignored - component uses Canvas2D. Reserved for future multi-renderer support.

width.description: Canvas width in pixels or 'full' for responsive

height.description: Canvas height in pixels or 'auto' for aspect ratio

debug.description: Debug mode shows hitboxes and entity info

enableInput.description: Enable keyboard input handling (updates Input entity)

eventBus.description: Event bus for emitting collision events

game-hud.description: Heads-up display showing health, score, lives

stats.description: Stats to display - accepts readonly for compatibility with generated const arrays

elements.description: Schema-style elements array (alternative to stats). Converted to stats internally for backwards compatibility.

transparent.description: Whether to use a semi-transparent background

controls.description: Controls to display - accepts readonly for compatibility with generated const arrays

game-menu.description: Main menu with start, options, credits

options.description: Menu options - accepts readonly for compatibility with generated const arrays

onSelect.description: Called when an option is selected (legacy callback, prefer event bus)

eventBus.description: Event bus for emitting UI events (optional, uses hook if not provided)

stats-grid.description: Grid display of statistics and metrics

stats.description: Array of stat items with label, value, and optional icon

columns.description: Number of columns in the grid

items.description: Array of checklist items with id and label

options.description: Array of options with value and label

game-pause-overlay.description: Pause menu that overlays the game

onSelect.description: Called when an option is selected (legacy callback, prefer event bus)

eventBus.description: Event bus for emitting UI events (optional, uses hook if not provided)

visible.description: Whether the pause menu is visible

onDismiss.description: Called when clicking outside the menu

game-over-screen.description: Game over screen with score and retry option

onAction.description: Called when an action is selected (legacy callback, prefer event bus)

eventBus.description: Event bus for emitting UI events (optional, uses hook if not provided)

highScore.description: High score (optional, shows "NEW HIGH SCORE!" if exceeded)

currentScore.description: Current score for high score comparison

level-select.description: Grid or list of levels to choose from

selectEvent.description: Event to emit on selection (schema config)

onSelect.description: Called when a level is selected

navigatesTo.description: Path to navigate to on selection. Supports :id, :levelId, :number placeholders

game-debug-panel.description: Debug overlay showing FPS, entity states, collision boxes

tilemap-renderer.description: Renders tile-based level data from instances with camera following

inventory-panel.description: Grid-based inventory UI for items, equipment, or resources

onSelectSlot.description: Called when a slot is selected

onUseItem.description: Called when an item is used (double-click or Enter)

onDropItem.description: Called when an item is dropped

dialogue-box.description: RPG-style dialogue box with speaker, portrait, and choices

typewriterSpeed.description: Typewriter speed in ms per character (0 = instant)

onChoice.description: Called when a choice is selected

onAdvance.description: Called when dialogue is advanced (no choices)

input-listener.description: Invisible component that captures keyboard/mouse input and emits events

eventBus.description: Event bus for emitting events (optional, uses hook if not provided)

collision-detector.description: Invisible component that runs collision detection and emits collision events

eventBus.description: Event bus for emitting events (optional, uses hook if not provided)

card-deck.description: Stack of cards representing a draw pile or discard pile

turn-indicator.description: Shows whose turn it is in turn-based games

puzzle-board.description: Board for sliding puzzles, jigsaw, etc.

runtime-debugger.description: Debug overlay showing FPS, entity states, event logs

pattern-proposal.description: Allows LLM to propose new patterns with a fallback

onClick.description: Event to emit on click (for programmatic navigation)

size.description: Size: xs, sm, md, lg, xl

weight.description: Font weight: normal, medium, semibold, bold

color.description: Color token: muted, primary, secondary, danger

size.description: Size override: xs, sm, md, lg, xl, 2xl, 3xl

badge.description: Small label for status or count

variant.description: Style variant: default, primary, secondary, success, warning, danger

card.description: Card container with optional header and footer

shadow.description: Shadow level: none, sm, md, lg

variant.description: Color variant: default, primary, success, warning, danger

type.description: Input type: text, email, password, number, tel, url

variant.description: Alert type: info, success, warning, error

maxWidth.description: Max width: sm, md, lg, xl, 2xl, full

padding.description: Horizontal padding: none, sm, md, lg

simple-grid.description: Simple responsive grid with auto columns

gap.description: Gap between items: xs, sm, md, lg

custom.description: Freeform custom HTML element with Tailwind classes

component.description: HTML element: div, span, button, a, h1-h6, section, etc.

action.description: Event to emit on click (REQUIRED for button/a elements)
